9.name: Emergency Response Hero
9.description: Always willing to lend a hand, or sword, for the common good. You go where the action is.

112.name: Guild Warrior
112.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
112.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

146.name: Garnet Sanctum
146.description: Unlock the treasures in the Garnet Sanctum.

159.name: Spekks's Laboratory
159.description: Survive a trip through Spekks's Laboratory. For science!

251.name: Marauder
251.description: Enemies pause when they see you coming.

349.name: Windy Cave Treasure
349.requirement: Find the treasure of the Windy Cave.

484.name: Maguuman Veteran Killer
484.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Maguuma Jungle maps: Caledon Forest, Metrica Province, Brisban Wildlands, Sparkfly Fen, and Mount Maelstrom.

643.name: Daily WvW Land Claimer
643.requirement: Claim land for your realm in World versus World.

645.name: Daily WvW Tower Capturer
645.requirement: Capture towers for your realm in World versus World.

662.name: Case Closed (2013)
662.requirement: You solved the mystery. The good people of Lion's Arch can breathe easier now.

665.name: Every Piece Matters (2013)
665.requirement: Find all the missing suspects in Tyria.

689.name: Aetherblade Assassin
689.requirement: Hunted down and killed members of Tyria's newest pirate faction.

702.name: Best. Dive. Ever.
702.requirement: Perform the highest dive ever off the edge of Zephyr Sanctum.

767.name: Luminary of Kryta
767.requirement: Complete  Beacon of Kryta torch run.

811.name: Queen's Gauntlet Champion
811.requirement: Complete  of the Queen's Gauntlet achievements.

884.name: Here Be Dragons!
884.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

911.name: Stay Dry, Stay Alive
911.requirement: Avoid Tequatl's tidal wave with the help of a jump pad.

929.name: Who's in Charge Here?
929.description: Forget the minions; talk to the manager.
929.requirement: Kill Foreman Spur first—without disengaging or dying—and then finish off his entire crew.

1007.name: Bonebreaker
1007.requirement: Defeat the Labyrinthine Horror in Mad King's Maze.

1047.name: Halloween Costume Brawl Champion
1047.description: Emerge as a champion from a costume brawl.

1153.name: Fractal Fortnight: Solid Ocean
1153.description: Don't forget to ride the wave.
1153.requirement: You've completed the Solid Ocean fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1182.name: Toxic Pollen Survival
1182.requirement: Survive in toxic pollen for  pulses.

1189.name: Holo-Hornpipe
1189.description: It's Dance Like A Pirate Day!
1189.requirement: Dance with the Aetherblade hologram dancers.

1198.name: Molten Boss Fractal Stabilizer
1198.description: The Molten Alliance just lost its two heaviest hitters.
1198.requirement: You've completed the Molten Boss fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1222.name: Aftermath Molten Extinguisher
1222.requirement: Kill  of Scarlet's Molten Alliance minions.

1225.name: Aftermath Toxic Gardener II
1225.requirement: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1240.name: Aftermath Toxic Boss Slayer IV
1240.requirement: Defeat the toxic spider queen, toxic wurm queen, toxic alchemist, or toxic warlock.

1330.name: Boss Thumper XIV
1330.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1334.name: Wurmslayer
1334.requirement: Defeat each of the great jungle wurm's  heads in Bloodtide Coast.

bits.text: Triple Threat
Aetherblade Broken
Melted and Muted
Antitoxin
Breach from the Beach
The Northern Gambit
Cold Comfort
Please Follow Me to the Exit
Memories in Your Hand
Postern Ward Protector
Trader's Forum Triumphant
Fort Marriner Fighter
Triple Play
All Bets Are Off
Live on the Edge
Raiders of the Lost Parts
Delaqua Investigator

1402.name: Triple Play
1402.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1402.requirement: Completely retake all 3 attack areas and begin the final push to retake Lion's Arch.

1414.name: Morale Booster
1414.requirement: Encourage Lion's Arch citizens at this dark time.

1506.name: Commanding Heights
1506.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1506.requirement: Meet up with Lionguard Turma at Diverse Ledges.

1576.name: Ogre Obliterator
1576.requirement: Kill  ogre in the Crown Pavilion.

1642.name: Zephyr's Leap
1642.requirement: Dive into a hay pile from the highest point in Prospect Valley and survive.

1700.name: The Dragon's Reach, Part 2
1700.requirement: Remove the remaining obstacles preventing a fully attended world summit, and represent the Pact at the summit.

1742.name: Lovestruck Weapon Collection
1742.description:
<c=@flavor>"Keep your heart on your sleeve—or blade. Either way hurts when I am angered."
– Lord Faren</c>
1742.requirement: Unlock all  Lovestruck weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1763.name: Pumpkin Carving
1763.description: Made in the Mad King's own image.
1763.requirement: Find pumpkins all around Tyria and carve them.

1784.name: "The Dragon's Reach, Part 1" Mastery
1784.requirement: Complete all  achievements for "The Dragon's Reach, Part 1."

1785.name: "Echoes of the Past" Mastery
1785.requirement: Complete all  "Echoes of the Past" achievements.

1813.name: Pact Fleet Weapon Collection
1813.description: <c=@flavor>Show your support for the Pact Fleet by collecting all of the weapons from their armory.</c>
1813.requirement: Unlock all  Pact Fleet weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1834.name: Retrospective Runaround
1834.description: Uncover the secrets of Sand Dune Caverns.

1904.name: Daily King Jalis's Refuge Jumping Puzzle
1904.requirement: Complete the King Jalis's Refuge jumping puzzle in Snowden Drifts.

2037.name: Wrapping Everywhere
2037.description: Only one way to find out what's inside.

2108.name: Daily Elementalist or Necromancer Winner
2108.requirement: Win  PvP match as an elementalist or necromancer.

2219.name: Artful Dodger
2219.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2219.requirement: When ascending the narrow path off the plateau, destroy all the Mordrem tendrils without being hit by their poison area attacks.

2221.name: Yggdrasil
2221.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the druid's staff, Yggdrasil.
2221.locked_text: Begin training the ranger's druid elite specialization.

bits.text: Created in the Mystic Forge.
Earn bronze or better in this adventure.
Requires training Stealth Gliding in the Gliding Mastery line.
Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Found on ore nodes in Auric Basin. Requires training Exalted Gathering in the Exalted Lore Mastery line.
Defeat a Treasure Mushroom. Requires training Nuhoch Stealth Detection in the Nuhoch Lore Mastery line.
Completely unlock the elite specialization.
Created from a plated weapon purchased for crystalline ore in Dragon's Stand.

2230.name: Scrap Rifle Field Test: Silver
2230.requirement: Kill as many chak as you can before the timer runs out, but be careful—your scrap rifle is prone to overheating! Destroying chak eggs will release a goo that will heal you and cool your rifle if you are close by, but it's likely to stir up the chak.

2298.name: The Ley-Line Run: Silver
2298.requirement: Zap your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2309.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 36
2309.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2329.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 7
2329.requirement: Complete  scale 7 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2330.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 30
2330.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2363.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 32
2363.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2440.name: Establishing a Foothold
2440.requirement: Speak to Pact members for information.

2466.name: Stick the Landing
2466.description: Story Instance: Prisoners of the Dragon
2466.requirement: When gliding down into the Mordrem prison camp, land within the marked target zone.

bits.text: Kill the enraged chak overlord lurking in the chak stronghold.
Slay the champion chak blitzer to complete the Nuhoch's beetle training.
Eliminate the gigantic chak lobber in the valley outside Teku Nuhoch.
Rescue Zildi's Assist-o-Matic from the chak lobber near Rata Novus.
Defend the SCAR camp from the shielded chak blitzer.
Outsmart the chak crown and disrupt the chak in the Ley-Line Confluence.
Defeat the extra goopy chak lobber in the hive near the SCAR lane.

2672.name: League Rank Earner—Recruit
2672.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2672.requirement: Obtain 40,000 rank points from playing ranked matches.

2676.name: League Warrior—Recruit
2676.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Professional—Recruit achievement.
2676.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a warrior.

2692.name: League Professional—Veteran
2692.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension II: Tapestry of Sacrifice.

2758.name: League Slayer—Recruit
2758.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.

2771.name: Dolyak Defender
2771.description: This dolyak WILL make it to deliver the presents today.
2771.requirement: Survive Toypocalypse with at least one living gift dolyak.

2778.name: Disassembly
2778.description: Don't they ever test this stuff?
2778.requirement: Defeat misbehaving Wintersday toys while helping Tixx run the workshop or exploring Tyria.

2810.name: Lightning Reflexes
2810.requirement: Dodge the Shatterer's Focused Lightning Attack  time while gliding.

2867.name: The Kaiser
2867.requirement: Unlock all  Kaiser Snake weapon skins in your wardrobe.

2901.name: Daily Citadel of Flame
2901.requirement: Complete any path in the Citadel of Flame explorable dungeon.

2949.name: Daily Tier 2 Snowblind
2949.requirement: Complete Snowblind at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2986.name: Daily Tier 3 Solid Ocean
2986.requirement: Complete Solid Ocean at fractal scale 51 or higher.

3002.name: Bounty Hunter
3002.requirement: Complete  daily bounty order from the Shining Blade.

3048.name: For Whom the Bell Tolls
3048.description: That's the signal! Fire at will!
3048.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that captures the bell during Revenge of the Capricorn rated matches  time.

3049.name: Grief Counseling
3049.requirement: Emote yes to Alari when she reaches her existential crisis.

3077.name: Was It Blue or Red?
3077.description: Story Instance: Research in Rata Novus

3134.name: I'm Rubber; You're Destroyer
3134.requirement: Kill forty destroyers with their own pustule bombs.

3159.name: Bonebreaker
3159.requirement: Defeat the Labyrinthine Horror in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3187.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 68
3187.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

3196.name: Daily Tier 2 Nightmare
3196.requirement: Complete Nightmare at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3281.name: Champion's Champion
3281.description: The greatest champions always find a way to win.
3281.requirement: Win  rated match in the Battle of Champion's Dusk.

3302.name: Forest Stalker
3302.requirement: Defeat  player during Forest of Niflhel rated matches.

3340.name: Confessor's End
3340.requirement: Bring a decisive end to the Confessor's ambitions.

3364.name: Free at Last
3364.description: "I'd rather die than remain here any longer."
3364.requirement: Defeat the demon and liberate the prisoner.

3494.name: Playing for Keeps
3494.requirement: Bounce a single globolla marble on your head eight times in a row.

3513.name: Shattered Observatory Fractal
3513.description: Stitch the tears in the fabric of reality.
3513.requirement: Complete all the achievements associated with the Shattered Observatory fractal.

3597.name: Cursed Flintlock
3597.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the deadeye's rifle, Cursed Flintlock.
3597.locked_text: Begin training the thief's deadeye elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the thief's deadeye elite specialization.
Drops from Forged in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Mayor Kabir of Zephyr's Trace in Crystal Oasis.
As a thief, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for the Forged Warmonger in the Vehjin Palace of the Domain of Vabbi.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a thief in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Help prevent saboteurs from poisoning Bonestrand fields in the Desolation.
Explore the Deadhouse in the Elon Riverlands with your jackal.
Drops for thieves from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the thief's deadeye elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a thief.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3603.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Shallows of Despair
3603.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3605.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Makali Outpost
3605.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3663.name: Shadow of a Shadow
3663.description: To earn this title, one must prove their commitment to freeing Elona by aiding the Order of Shadows.
3663.requirement: Complete all six Order of Shadows achievements.

bits.text: Achievement: A Redeemer's Friend
Achievement: Shadow Patroller
Achievement: Realm-Portal Spiker
Achievement: Shadow Sprinter
Achievement: Sulfur Shooter
Achievement: Shadows Provisions

3739.name: Renowned Adventurer: Desert Highlands
3739.requirement: Complete all of the renown hearts located in the Desert Highlands.

bits.text: Help out around Highjump Ranch.
Help the Makali community.
Help the Pricklepatch Hollow choya, or don't.
Pitch in around Lommuld Kraal.

3761.name: Elon Riverlands Insight: Ossa's Defeat
3761.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Elon Riverlands.

3817.name: Elon Riverlands Griffon Expert: Gold
3817.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3830.name: Always Time for Taimi
3830.description: You found time in your busy schedule to update Taimi on every event.
3830.requirement: Call Taimi and update her on your desert adventures after each step.

3844.name: Maintaining Order
3844.requirement: Speak with Shining Blade Officer Ralan about bandit activity in Kryta.

3884.name: Springer Backpacking
3884.requirement: Take your springer out to help those in need, and gain tasty treats for your springer as a reward.

bits.text: Sent by Stablemaster Unja for helping out around Highjump Ranch.
Given by Stablemaster Unja in Highjump Ranch for talking to her about helping the local traders.
Given by Trader Berjas in Highjump Ranch for recovering the town's supplies.
Given by Merchant Ollgi in Lommuld Kraal for delivering her shipment of supplies and finding her lentils.
Given by Merchant Ouna in Diviner's Reach for delivering her shipment and locating a rare desert herb.
Given by Merchant Ket'abatchk at Brightwater Inlet for delivering his shipment and recovering his bag of shinies.
Found atop a waterfall above Highjump Ranch's farm, protected by harpies.
Given by Trader Berjas in Highjump Ranch for recovering the town's supplies.
Given by Trader Berjas in Highjump Ranch for recovering the town's supplies.
Given by Trader Berjas in Highjump Ranch for recovering the town's supplies.
Found high on the mountain cliffs west of the Nimbose Butte.
Found at a bandit camp above Pricklepatch Hollow.

3912.name: The Lost Dolyak
3912.description: Search southern Stampede Uplands for Jeppa's lost dolyak, and then speak to Jeppa.

bits.text: Find Bismuth in southern Stampede Uplands.
Help Jeppa reach her destination and talk to her about Bismuth.

3932.name: A Royal Tradition
3932.requirement: Impress Mad King Thorn with your obedience in a round of Mad King Says.

3972.name: Thereby Hangs a Tale
3972.description: Story Instance: The Hero of Istan
3972.requirement: Relive the tales of the imprisoned storyteller.

3978.name: Lightspeed Reflector
3978.description: The scholars need light to read by, after all.
3978.requirement: Rotate all of the mirrors at the top of the Astralarium within 30 seconds.

4073.name: Alchemist Weapon Collection
4073.requirement: Unlock all  Alchemist weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4077.name: Lunar Firestarter
4077.requirement: Complete the Firecracker Lighting adventure in Divinity's Reach.

4079.name: New Year's Benevolence
4079.requirement: Donate Lunar New Year food to the celestial pigs for good luck in the new year.

4149.name: Three Golem Monte
4149.description: Err...can I see that one more time?
4149.requirement: Consecutively choose the correct golem in all rounds of the Golem Eye Exam event.

4176.name: Master Diver: Bloodtide Coast
4176.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4176.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Bloodtide Coast.

4221.name: Boots on the Ground
4221.requirement: During your final confrontation with the Voice in the Deepstone fractal, do not fall or jump off of the platform.

4299.name: Light Up the Darkness
4299.requirement: Defeat Liadri the Concealing Dark after striking her with eight orbs of blazing light.

4353.name: Right On Track
4353.requirement: Successfully prevented the Branded from interrupting Blish while setting up the tracker.

4369.name: Is It Over Yet?
4369.description:
Koss was impressed. Braham was happy. Time to never mention this again—for Braham's sake.

Story Instance: Legacy
4369.requirement: Light all braziers and clear out the hall within the time limit to make Braham look good.

4377.name: Dive Master: Rilohn Falls
4377.description: When the water isn't deep enough, improvise.
4377.requirement: Find and use the diving goggles at the top of a tall waterfall.

4396.name: The Fire Djinn Extinguished
4396.description: His mad scheme is thwarted, the cauldron made safe.

4398.name: Poster Child
4398.requirement: Place all of Zaeim's recruitment posters around Tyria.

bits.text: Spoke to Zaeim and accepted his request.
Reclaimed Chantry, Jahai Bluffs
Pact Vanguard, Jahai Bluffs
Yatendi, Jahai Bluffs
Confluence of the Elements, Jahai Bluffs
Almorra's Stand, Jahai Bluffs
Amnoon, Crystal Oasis
Makali Outpost, Desert Highlands
First Camp, Elon Riverlands
Village of Purity, The Desolation
Vehtendi Academy, Domain of Vabbi
Fort Marriner, Lion's Arch
Ebonhawke, Fields of Ruin
Ossan Quarter, Divinity's Reach
Central Plaza, Divinity's Reach

4415.name: Hard Hats Required beyond This Point
4415.description: It has been ZERO days without an accident.
4415.requirement: Stand under every column of falling junk.

bits.text: Accident-Prone
Look Out Below!
Hazardous Work Conditions
Watch for Falling Debris!
Occupational Hazard

4418.name: Garrison Historian
4418.description: Gathering primary-source documents can get messy.
4418.requirement: Bring Priory Historian Sivvi enough material to learn the whole history of Argon Garrison.

4435.name: (Annual) Arguably Foodlike
4435.requirement: Eat more than the recommended intake of candy corn. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4436.name: (Annual) Mad Drifter
4436.requirement: Complete a lap of the race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway within the challenge time. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4490.name: (Annual) Wintersday Traditions
4490.requirement: Complete  annual Wintersday achievement. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4492.name: Polar Bones
4492.requirement: Discover the remains of an ancient king in the Secret Lair of the Snowmen.

4507.name: Don't Mine If I Do
4507.requirement: Place mines to defend Thunderhead Keep from the Branded.

4545.name: Crystal Circuit Racer
4545.requirement: Finish the attack on Kralkatorrik in under 15 minutes.

4638.name: Smodur's Blessing
4638.requirement: Speak with the Black Citadel's leader while mounted.

4730.name: Skyscale of Life
4730.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with life.

bits.text: Speak with the Priestess of Dwayna at the Plaza of Dwayna in Divinity's Reach.
Revive 3 allies while under the effects of Dwayna's Directive.
Revive 6 more allies while under the effects of Dwayna's Directive.
Revive 9 more allies while under the effects of Dwayna's Directive.

4733.name: Skyscale Toys
4733.requirement: Purchase toys from around Tyria to give to your skyscale.

bits.text: Purchase a Hardy Ball from Jannat at Vehtendi Academy in the Domain of Vabbi, then give it to your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.
Purchase a Bird Whistle from Ohtrogg, Bird Whisperer, near Ebbing Heart Run in Iron Marches, then give it to your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.
Purchase a Heavy-Duty Dolyak Blanket from Herder Lyot near Bouldermouth Vale in Lornar's Pass, then give it to your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.
Craft a Grow Lamp with a jeweler using a recipe obtained in Drytop, or purchase one from the Trading Post. Give the resulting item to your skyscale in Sun's Refuge.

4741.name: Dragonfall Insight: Dragon's Snare
4741.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in Dragonfall.

4746.name: Skyscale of Air
4746.requirement: Infuse your skyscale egg with air.

bits.text: Speak with Grand Elder Air Djinn Dhizosai or Grandmaster Elder Djinn Emine at Zagonur Cliffs in Domain of Vabbi. Defeat nearby foes to draw them out.
Get knocked down by a Dust Mite Twister, commonly found in arid and desert-like areas.
Interact with the Cluster of Winds in the Hidden Garden jumping puzzle in Mount Maelstrom.
Get caught in the Brand tornado in Jahai Bluffs.

4771.name: Vision II: Farsight
4771.description:
Can you see past the void?

Note: Only Mastery Insights in Living World Season 4 are required for this achievement.
4771.requirement: Kneel and contemplate your mastery of the veil at Insights across Tyria.
4771.locked_text: Complete the Vision I: Awakening achievement to unlock this achievement.

4799.name: Power Trip
4799.description: No single djinn should wield all that power.

4892.name: Bonus Event: Daily Champion Rush—Kryta
4892.requirement: Defeat a champion-rank enemy in Queensdale, Gendarran Fields, Kessex Hills, Harathi Hinterlands, Bloodtide Coast, or Southsun Cove.

5018.name: Lighting the Legacy
5018.requirement: Completed the light puzzle in the chasm around Asgeir's Legacy.

5095.name: Hold onto the Light
5095.requirement: Complete the Boneskinner Strike Mission without letting any torches be extinguished by wisps.

5205.name: Alpha Strike
5205.requirement: During the final encounter of Forging Steel, attack using the tank's heavy gun while the Ancient Forgeman is restrained.

5233.name: Priority Strike: Fraenir of Jormag
5233.requirement: Defeat the Fraenir of Jormag in the Raven Sanctum Strike Mission.

5260.name: Special Mission: Pillage the Port
5260.requirement: Destroy  structures at Port Cascadia in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5265.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Speaker Hunter
5265.requirement: Destroy  propaganda speakers in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5288.name: Special Mission: Do Your Part
5288.requirement: Donate materials to quaestors for each type of commendation.
5288.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

bits.text: Charr Commendations
Ash Legion Commendations
Blood Legion Commendations
Flame Legion Commendations
Iron Legion Commendations

5312.name: Glory to the Blood Legion
5312.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5334.name: Glory to the Flame Legion
5334.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5335.name: Special Mission: Apothecary
5335.requirement: Bring medicine to  exhausted sentries in allied bases around the Drizzlewood Coast.
5335.locked_text: Unlock by using Flame Legion Special Mission Documents.

5378.name: Drizzlewood Coast Insight: The Frostveins
5378.requirement: Discover this Icebrood Saga Mastery Insight in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5524.name: Jormag's World
5524.requirement: Complete the story chapter Jormag's World.

5527.name: Daily Gyala Delve Jade Brotherhood Slayer
5527.requirement: Kill 25 Jade Brotherhood in Gyala Delve.

5558.name: Daily: Exalted Donations
5558.requirement: Donate needed materials to the Exalted.

5832.name: Crop Harvester: Bitterfrost Frontier
5832.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Bitterfrost Frontier.

5933.name: Reconquer the Displaced Tower
5933.requirement: Complete the displaced tower jumping puzzle in Jahai Bluffs.

5978.name: Practiced Seeker
5978.requirement: Play a game of hide-and-seek with the charr cub in the Blood Keep...and win.

6022.name: Revenge at Wolf's Crossing
6022.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of Wolf's Crossing.

6227.name: Avid Orrian Fisher
6227.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6227.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Orr.

bits.text:
Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.
Fishing Hole: None, Open Water
Favored Bait: Any
Time of Day: Dusk/Dawn

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Any
Time of Day: Nighttime

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Leeches
Time of Day: Any

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.
Fishing Hole: Offshore Fish
Favored Bait: Leeches
Time of Day: Any

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.

Favored Bait: Any

Found in the waters of the Ruins of Orr.

6267.name: Seitung Province Insight: Dreary Caves
6267.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Seitung Province.

6290.name: Pure Enmity
6290.description: "Zal, he...he wasn't a good person. It's about time we figured out what happened to him. What really happened."—Hui
6290.requirement: Retrieve Purist documents in Old Kaineng.

bits.text: Search the ruins of Old Kaineng for the first clue.
Search the ruins of Old Kaineng for the second clue.
Search the ruins of Old Kaineng for the third clue.
Search the ruins of Old Kaineng for the fourth clue.

6305.name: Forest Warfare
6305.requirement: Participate in all events related to the Gang War of Echovald meta-event in Echovald Wilds.

bits.text: Free Kropa Village from the Jade Brotherhood.
Bring Speaker incendiary supplies to Stas.
Defeat the Jade Brotherhood mechs assaulting Cylow Outpost.
Destroy summoning circles and defeat Speaker ritualists terrorizing Teleri Village.
Reveal and defeat hidden Jade Brotherhood goons in Karstadt Village.
Locate and defuse Speaker mines in Goa Village.
Prevent either gang from seizing control of the Xunlai Jade Junkyard.
Defeat the Speaker and Jade Brotherhood lieutenants.
Defeat Prototype XJ-1.

6369.name: Lighting Dragon's End
6369.description: Do not light the lanterns because they need to be lit, but because joy is found in bringing light to the world.
6369.requirement: Transfer power to  jade lanterns at points of interest in Dragon's End. These lanterns will only appear after 100% map exploration.

6406.name: Dragon's End Insight: Jade Waves
6406.requirement: Discover this End of Dragons Mastery Insight in Dragon's End.

6422.name: I Am the Captain
6422.requirement: Unlock the skiff by completing the Shinota Shore task region in Seitung Province and by purchasing a skiff from Hall Director Soohee.

6459.name: Master Harbinger
6459.requirement: Completely train the necromancer's harbinger elite specialization.

6495.name: Purifier
6495.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the willbender's sword, Purifier.
6495.locked_text: Begin training the guardian's willbender elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the guardian's willbender elite specialization.
Completely train the guardian's willbender elite specialization.
Combine an Oiled Orichalcum Sword Hilt, 25 Globs of Ectoplasm, Chunks of Jade, and Chunks of Petrified Echovald Resin in the Mystic Forge.
As a guardian, complete the New Kaineng City map meta-event.
As a guardian, complete the Seitung Province meta-event.
As a guardian, complete the Ministry of Security story instance or strike.
As a willbender, complete the End of Dragons storyline or the Battle for the Jade Sea meta-event.
Catch a dragonet in Seitung Province.
Purchased from the crafting research vendor in the Echovald Wilds.
Purchased from the map currency vendor in New Kaineng City.
Earned by defeating Aetherblade enemies in New Kaineng City.
Earn map completion in Dragon's End as a guardian.
As a guardian, defeat any of the Purist leaders (Akma, Gakkai, Jo Da, Mal-Chin, Mun-Hee, Ryeo, Sarin, or Sonsang) in the ruins of Old Kaineng within New Kaineng City.
Acquired by mining jade nodes as a guardian.

6720.name: Decade of Adventure: Ascalon
6720.requirement: Complete  events in the Ascalon region.

6767.name: New Kaineng Weapon Collection
6767.requirement: Unlock all  New Kaineng weapon skins in your wardrobe.

6866.name: The Facet of Water and Life
6866.requirement: Unlock all legendary Soo-Won weapon variants.

6904.name: World Lore: Special Ops Rescue Agency
6904.requirement: Learn all you can from Captain Wing Jun.

6916.name: Gyala Delve Beetle Racer: Gold
6916.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Roller Beetle adventure with a gold rating.

6932.name: Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer: Gold
6932.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Jade Bot Racer adventure with a gold rating.

7015.name: Securing the Bastions
7015.requirement: Help the Astral Ward by completing events at each of the six bastions across Amnytas.

bits.text: Bastion of the Natural
Bastion of the Obscure
Bastion of the Celestial
Bastion of Balance
Bastion of Strength
Bastion of Knowledge

7038.name: Off to See the Wizard's Tower
7038.requirement: Successfully complete events during Unlocking the Wizard's Tower meta-event.

bits.text: Gather Essence of Awe around Droknar's Light
Gather Essence of Aggression around Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03
Gather Essence of Joy around the Rata Novus Promenade
Gather Essence of Anxiety around Devastated Garenhoff
Gather Essence of Judgment around Primal Maguuma
Gather Essence of Despair around the Skyward Marches
Protect Lyhr while He Forges a Key
Purge Lyhr of Kryptis Corruption

7081.name: Protector of the Beacon of Ages and Garenhoff
7081.description: One less thing for Mayor Manrin to panic about.
7081.requirement: Successfully complete events around the Beacon of Ages and Garenhoff.

bits.text: Help the Astral Ward calm the agitated skyscales at the Beacon of Ages.
Find survivors in Garenhoff.
Do not let all the villagers get possessed. (Event 2 of 3)
Help Lucretia get back to Garenhoff. (Event 1 of 3)
Defeat Possessed Lucretia. (Event 3 of 3)
Escort Alchemist Briella to the Rift Hunters. (Event 2 of 3)
Defeat the intercepting Kryptis. (Event 3 of 3)
Help Briella prepare motivations for the Rift Hunters. (Event 1 of 3)
Repair the magical barriers protecting the Beacon of Ages.
Defeat the champion elemental.

7083.name: Zojja's Journal
7083.requirement: Collect all of Zojja's journal pages in Skywatch Archipelago.

bits.text: Speak to Zojja at the Wizard's Tower.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Devastated Garenhoff achievement.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Skyward Marches achievement.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Droknar's Light achievement.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03 achievement.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Primal Maguuma achievement.
Complete the Zojja's Journal: Rata Novus Promenade achievement.
Return to Zojja after collecting all of the journal pages.

7167.name: Timberline Falls Rift Hunting
7167.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Timberline Falls.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7173.name: Wizard's Tower Trial: Gold
7173.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Wizard's Tower Trial.

7220.name: Ignorance Is Bliss
7220.description: If everyone stays happy, then there's no danger, right?
7220.requirement: Participate in various activities during the "Help the Rata Novans prepare for a party" event.

7550.name: Emotional Fortitude
7550.requirement: Defeat all of the embodiments of the chapter boss.

bits.text: Embodiment of Envy
Embodiment of Rage
Embodiment of Despair
Embodiment of Gluttony
Embodiment of Regret
Embodiment of Malice

7635.name: Verdant Brink Rift Hunting
7635.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Verdant Brink.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

7672.name: Kryptis Turret Killer
7672.description: Those skyscale adventures have trained you for this. It's true!

7691.name: Ignaxious Eradicator
7691.requirement: Complete each of the 5 events in the Road to Heitor meta-event and defeat Ignaxious.

bits.text: Collect emotional residue to supercharge the southern beacon.
Carry the Beacon's Flame to light the northern beacon.
Collect emotional residue to supercharge the northern beacon.
Secure the area while Ramses and Arina bring down the barrier.
Defeat Ignaxious.

7726.name: Loyalist Harrier
7726.description: Chaos meets surprising beauty in the Realm of Dreams.
7726.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in Heitor's territory in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Defeat the champion Avatar of Rage.
Defeat the wanderer. (Event 2 of 2)
Destroy the Kryptis siege weapons.
Defeat the Kryptis before they open a rift into Tyria.
Prevent the Kryptis from repairing the extractor.
Escort the recon team as they investigate unusual Kryptis activity. (Event 1 of 2)
Find and destroy the tendrils of Nourys. (Event 1 of 3)
Use your skyscale to intercept magic around the extractor. (Event 2 of 3)
Defeat Valdus the Silent. (Event 3 of 3)
Destroy the Kryptis turrets.
Defend Lieutenant Sejana Forgewill by fighting off Kryptis.
Find and defeat the Kryptis patrol leaders. (Event 1 of 4)
Collect the remains of the Astral Ward defenses. (Event 2 of 4)
Defend the turrets from being destroyed. (Event 3 of 4)
Defeat Kyrillas the Purifier. (Event 4 of 4)
Retrieve the stolen supplies.

7771.name: Local Response: Tower of Nightmares (Weekly)
7771.requirement: Complete  events in the Tower of Nightmares.

7790.name: Legendary Temple of Febe
7790.requirement: Complete the Temple of Febe Strike Mission with challenge mode active.

7874.name: Foes Reborn: Saurians
7874.requirement: Defeat saurian enemies in any region.

7976.name: Dragonbrand Veteran
7976.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8060.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Sorrow: Silver
8060.requirement: Earn silver-rank timing or better in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8091.name: Inner Nayos Mastery III
8091.description: "And now you've proven yourself an entire meal."
8091.requirement:
Complete achievements throughout Inner Nayos, or take a break to enjoy a few adventures.

(Note: The Mastery point is a reward for partial completion of this achievement.)

8179.name: Harvest Den Renown Mastery
8179.description: Diplomacy isn't always about paperwork or negotiations. Sometimes you gotta get your paws a little dirty.
8179.requirement: Gain favor with the lowlanders to grow your friendship.

8303.name: Harvest Shore Salmon Run: Silver
8303.requirement: Earn a silver medal in the Harvest Shore Salmon Run.

8314.name: Fungus Strikes Back
8314.description: The Mushroom King has some extra-special moves the for open minded...
8314.requirement: Get hit by the Mushroom King's hallucination attack.

8327.name: Chasing Waterfalls: Lowland Shore
8327.requirement: Check behind waterfalls in Lowland Shore.

bits.text: Surrounded by the smell of a bog, you can hear the faint growls of warclaws from far above.
While the pervasive stench of a bog fills your nose...wait. Is that a...lizard?
After a large drop, you can see the flickering of braziers far above you.
At the mouth where two rivers meet, there is a strong smell of fish in the air.
At a kodan outpost that smells strongly of fish.
Below where logs tumble down and frogs are gathered.
Fish come flying down from under a flying base.
A long drop, but is that a barrel at the bottom?
Large drops heading into a busy village.
Near a flying base.
There is a faint trail of sawdust in the water from far above the stream.
Below very large tracks and the smell of crops.

8344.name: Harvest Shore Salmon Run: Bronze
8344.requirement: Earn a bronze medal in the Harvest Shore Salmon Run.

8466.name: Full Moon Weapon Collector
8466.requirement: Unlock all  Full Moon weapon skins by completing events in Janthir Syntri or by purchasing them from the Trading Post and binding them to you.

8480.name: Shield Generator Expertise
8480.requirement: Block enemy projectiles 50 times with a shield generator.

8491.name: Life of the Party
8491.requirement: Speak with the other guests at the battle's eve feast.

bits.text: Talk to Dagda and Waiting Sorrow.
Talk to Isgarren.
Talk to Stoic Alder and Poised Arrow.

8528.name: Revenge at Wolf's Crossing (Weekly)
8528.requirement: Participate in a successful siege of Wolf's Crossing.

8533.name: Daily Forging Steel
8533.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel cooperative mission, launched from the scrying pool in the Eye of the North.

8552.name: Missing Scout
8552.description: There have been reports of missing scouts in the area. Maybe someone at the Alliance Staging Ground knows more.
8552.requirement: Complete the steps to investigate the missing scouts.

bits.text: Someone at the Alliance Staging Ground must know more.
Talk to Ocean Bloom and Blinding Sunrise about their missing friend.
Ocean Bloom and Blinding Sunrise said to seek out Quiet Lagoon, who is scouting in the north.
Quiet Lagoon is having me look for his missing scouts. Riven Marl should be among them.
Riven Marl was not among the missing scouts. Maybe they are lost somewhere else in these ruins.

8586.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Forty-Five
8586.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Five.

8659.name: (Annual) April Fools!
8659.requirement: Speak with Professor Smoll in Lion's Arch to receive a starter kit for hijinks.
